edu.wmich.cs3310.Thompson.FileReaderWriters

Interface IFileReaderWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileReaderWriter

    public interface IFileReaderWriter
    Provides the IFileReaderWriter interfeace for reading and writing to files.
    Author:
    Tyler Thompson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readFile()
      Reads the whole file.
      java.lang.String readLine(int line)
      Reads a single line out of the file.
      void writeLine(int line, java.lang.String data)
      Writes to a single line in the file.

    • Method Detail

      • readLine

        java.lang.String readLine(int line)
        Reads a single line out of the file.
        Parameters:
        line - Index of the line to read.
        Returns:
        The line as a string.

      • writeLine

        void writeLine(int line,
               java.lang.String data)
        Writes to a single line in the file.
        Parameters:
        line - Index of the file to write to.
        data - The string to write to that line.

      • readFile

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readFile()
        Reads the whole file.
        Returns:
        The file as an ArrayList. Each elements is a line from the file.
